Articles.Content:
So guys...

My first attempt at building something serious Planelike, I was going for speed and I think it turned out well:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

It came out pretty fast and stable, you can do a permanent physicswarp x2 while not steering with SAS.

Now its nothing too fancy, I just made it, came out sorta cool, thought I'd share.

Although its pretty small it does not have this jittering while steering because I locked some of the planes control surfaces to certain movements only as well as locking the engine gimbals.

Its fast and stable to steer and even to physwarp.

Dowload:

http://www./download/u2pbifj915yzi1n/Sonic+Flash+Mk1.craft

Thanks for your attention. Transmission over.
Anytime I see "airplane" I have to look. You definitly got the speed down, something I lack due to looks. Now you just need a bigger and faster one, good luck.
Nice plane! I love building planes too, I actually build more of them than actual spacecraft... lol

Nice plane! I love building planes too, I actually build more of them than actual spacecraft... lol

Thanks dude, looked at your ground vehicles, sick. xD
